source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a panoramic scenery shot of a bustling college football stadium during a game. The video lacks a single main subject, as the camera's wide, sweeping view is intended to capture the immense scale of the event and the energetic atmosphere of the crowd rather than focusing on an individual person or action. The camera pans slowly from right to left, revealing the full expanse of the venue under a cloudy sky. The stands are densely packed with thousands of spectators, many wearing purple, creating a vibrant tapestry of fans. Below, on the bright green football field marked with the "WILDCATS" and "NORTHWESTERN" team names, players in white and dark uniforms are positioned for a play. In the background, a line of green trees separates the stadium from distant buildings, and a large video scoreboard is visible at the far end of the field.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a panoramic scenery shot of a bustling college football stadium during a game. The video lacks a single main subject, as the camera's wide, sweeping view is intended to capture the immense scale of the event and the energetic atmosphere of the crowd rather than focusing on an individual person or action. The camera pans slowly from right to left, revealing the full expanse of the venue under a cloudy sky. The stands are densely packed with thousands of spectators, many wearing purple, creating a vibrant tapestry of fans. Below, on the bright green football field marked with the "WILDCATS" and "NORTHWESTERN" team names, players in white and dark uniforms are positioned for a play. In the background, a line of green trees separates the stadium from distant buildings, and a large video scoreboard is visible at the far end of the field.

generated_critique: While the caption correctly identifies the video as a panoramic scenery shot and captures the general essence of the scene, it misses several key visual details that would make the description more accurate and vivid. The description of the players as simply "positioned for a play" is too vague; the video clearly shows them in a specific kickoff formation, with the kicking team lined up on their own 35-yard line. The opposing team's uniforms are described as "dark," but they are distinctly identifiable as navy blue with orange numerals. Furthermore, the caption mentions the video scoreboard but fails to note the specific information it displays, such as the score (Northwestern leading 14-7) and the game clock, which are clearly visible. The description of the crowd could also be more specific; the video shows the student section is organized in purple and white stripes, and many fans are waving small pennants, adding a dynamic texture the caption overlooks. Lastly, the prominent Big Ten Conference logo painted at the 50-yard line is a central visual element on the field that is completely omitted from the description.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This panoramic video captures the vibrant atmosphere of a bustling college football stadium during a game. The camera's wide, sweeping view showcases the immense scale of the event, focusing on the energetic crowd and the action on the field. As the camera pans slowly from right to left under a cloudy sky, the densely packed stands reveal thousands of spectators, many wearing purple, with the student section organized in striking purple and white stripes. Fans enthusiastically wave small pennants, adding dynamic texture to the scene. On the bright green football field, marked with the "WILDCATS" and "NORTHWESTERN" team names, players are in a specific kickoff formation, with the kicking team lined up on their own 35-yard line. The opposing team is easily identifiable in navy blue uniforms with orange numerals. At the 50-yard line, the prominent Big Ten Conference logo is a central visual element. In the background, a line of green trees separates the stadium from distant buildings, while a large video scoreboard at the far end of the field displays the score, with Northwestern leading 14-7, and the game clock.
